parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden loss of engine power can cause the vehicle to stall or lose momentum, increasing the risk of accidents, especially when operating a school bus with passengers on board.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Failure Due to Lost Compression
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine failure due to lost compression can cause the vehicle to stall or lose power, potentially leading to accidents or stranding passengers, especially in critical situations such as school routes.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Unintended Brake Activation due to Corroded Tone Ring on Rear Rotor
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended brake activation can cause the vehicle to suddenly stop or lose control, potentially leading to accidents or injuries, especially when there are vehicles behind it.
symptoms: The brakes suddenly lock up without the driver touching the brake pedal
the vehicle comes to an unexpected stop
the traction control system activates unnecessarily.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Meritor/Wabco brake system can cause the brakes to suddenly lock up or fail to release, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The brakes suddenly lock up without the driver touching the brake pedal
the vehicle comes to an unexpected stop
the parking brake fails to release.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate Troubleshooting and Repair by Dealership
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the dealership to properly diagnose and repair the issue can lead to repeated incidents of unintended brake activation, potentially causing accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The dealership is unable to duplicate the problem
the dealership suggests repairs that may not address the root cause of the issue
the dealership fails to provide a clear explanation for the problem.
